channel.title: [delta]Changing prices on items, and editing shops?[delta]
channel.description:
i'd like to know how to change item prices and edit shop contents.
im using "Project Fast & Furious" source

go into your client.java and search for

change

to

ifPlayerinShop = true c.noobyQuestion
[/quote]
stop posting this shit…[/quote]
I’m just proving my point that the quiz needs to come back.
